TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityToken extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用來實作所有安全性權杖的基底類別。

span.span: Represents a base class used to implement all security tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用安全性權杖，提供驗證認證或保護訊息。Use a security token to provide authentication credentials or to protect a message. 安全性權杖可以用來提供驗證認證，密碼編譯金鑰的資料，或者，在安全性權杖的情況下發出安全性權杖服務 (STS)，關於主體的宣告集合。A security token can be used to provide authentication credentials, cryptographic key material, or, in the case of a security token issued by a security token service (STS), a collection of claims about a subject. 所有安全性權杖是都衍生自類別。All security tokens derive from the class. 從.NET 4.5 開始，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 完全整合到.NET Framework 和 WIF 所公開的類別會處理您的程式碼中的安全性權杖的慣用的方法。Beginning with .NET 4.5, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) has been fully integrated into the .NET Framework and the classes exposed by WIF are the preferred method of handling security tokens in your code. 在 WIF 中會序列化和還原序列化安全性權杖，並從其 XML 表示法是驗證及使用衍生自類別基底類別。In WIF, security tokens are serialized and deserialized to and from their XML representation and are validated by using classes derived from the base class. 驗證權杖不只確保權杖有效的但也會傳回包含執行個體的語彙基元可用於進行驗證和授權決策。Validating a token involves not just ensuring that the token is valid, but also returning a instance from the token that can be used in making authentication and authorization decisions. 建構由權杖處理常式實作的方法從也都是內建權杖的宣告型別本身為權杖中包含的宣告。The is constructed by the token handler’s implementation of the method from the claims contained in the token as well as from claims that are intrinsic to the token type itself. WIF 支援下列類型的安全性權杖隨附：WIF ships with support for the following types of security tokens: - ： 表示以 SAML 2.0 判斷提示為基礎的安全性權杖。: Represents a security token that is based upon a SAML 2.0 Assertion. 這個語彙基元的型別通常會發出安全性權杖服務要求回應中 Ws-trust 或 WS-同盟安全性權杖 (RST)。This token type is typically issued by a security token service in response to a WS-Trust or WS-Federation security token request (RST). - ： 表示 SAML 1.1 判斷提示為基礎的安全性權杖。: Represents a security token that is based upon a SAML 1.1 Assertion. 這個語彙基元的型別通常會發出安全性權杖服務要求回應中 Ws-trust 或 WS-同盟安全性權杖 (RST)。This token type is typically issued by a security token service in response to a WS-Trust or WS-Federation security token request (RST). - 和： 表示已接收或傳送 SOAP 訊息中的 Kerberos 票證為基礎的安全性權杖 and : Represents a security token that is based upon a Kerberos ticket that is received or sent in a SOAP message - ： 表示使用 RSA 演算法建立的索引鍵為基礎的安全性權杖。: Represents a security token that is based upon key that is created using the RSA algorithm. - ： 表示安全性權杖，其中包含工作階段的相關資訊。: Represents a security token that contains information about a session. - ： 表示使用者名稱和密碼為基礎的安全性權杖。: Represents a security token that is based on a username and password. - ： 表示 Windows 網域或使用者帳戶的身分識別為基礎的安全性權杖。: Represents a security token that is based on the identity of a Windows domain or user account. - ： 表示以 X.509 憑證為基礎的安全性權杖。: Represents a security token that is based on an X.509 certificate. - ： 表示對應至 Windows 網域使用者或本機電腦使用者帳戶的 X.509 憑證為基礎的安全性權杖。: Represents a security token that is based upon an X.509 certificate that is mapped to a Windows domain user or local computer user account. 兩個其他安全性權杖的類別、和，可用來協助處理一般情況。Two other security token classes, and , can be used to help handle general cases. 廣泛地說的安全性語彙基元可分成三個主要類別：Broadly speaking security tokens fall into three major categories: - 語彙基元執行或參考密碼編譯金鑰材料。Tokens that carry or reference cryptographic key material. 例如和類型通常用於此目的。For example the and types are often used for this purpose. - 代表已驗證的使用者認證的權杖。Tokens that represent credentials for users that have already been authenticated. 例如， ， ，並在使用者使用憑證，驗證的情況下型別。For example, the , , and, in the case of a user authenticated using a certificate, the types. - 使用 Ws-trust 或 WS-同盟通訊協定的安全性權杖的要求回應中安全性權杖服務 (STS) 所核發的權杖。Tokens that are issued by a security token service (STS) in response to a security token request using either the WS-Trust or WS-Federation protocol. 這些通常傳回中`wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse`XML 片段。These are typically returned in a `wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse` XML fragment. 和類型通常用來代表這些語彙基元。The and types are most often used to represent these tokens. 一種特殊的語彙基元類型，包含在主動或被動的案例中使用工作階段時重新建立主體所需的資訊。A special token type, the , contains information necessary to recreate a principal when using sessions in active or passive scenarios. 將功能加入現有的權杖類型，您可以從特定類型和其相關聯的語彙基元處理常式，以支援您將權杖加入任何新項目衍生。To add functionality to existing token types you can derive from the specific type and its associated token handler to support any new elements that you add to the token. 若要加入新的語彙基元類型支援，您可以直接衍生自類別。To add support for new token types, you can derive directly from the class. 當您這樣做時，您也必須由衍生自建立語彙基元處理常式類別類別。When you do this, you will also need to create a token handler class by deriving from the class. 根據您的權杖的方式使用，您可能也需要建立自訂的語彙基元解析程式由衍生自由衍生自類別也以一個或多個自訂的金鑰識別碼子句型別類別。Depending on how your token is to be used, you may also need to create a custom token resolver by deriving from the class as well as one or more custom key identifier clause types by deriving from the class. ## Examples 中所使用的程式碼範例主題摘錄自`Custom Token`範例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的實作`SimpleWebToken`類別和`SimpleWebTokenHandler`類別，以及其他類別，可支援 SWT 權杖。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 如需此範例，並提供其他範例 WIF 以及有關下載這些檔案的位置資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼顯示實作`SimpleWebToken`類別。The following code shows the implementation of the `SimpleWebToken` class. 這個類別會擴充。This class extends . [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，決定安全性權杖是否可以建立特定的金鑰識別碼。Use the method to determine whether a security token can create a specific key identifier. 呼叫 方法，以建立金鑰識別碼。To create the key identifier call the method. 預設實作會支援型別的金鑰識別碼子句。The default implementation supports key identifier clauses of type .

span.span: The unique identifier of the security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般來說，當安全性權杖已序列化為 XML 時，安全性權杖的 `Id` 屬性 (Attribute) 就會設定為 屬性 (Property) 的值。Typically, when a security token is serialized into XML, the `Id` attribute for the security token is set to the value of the property. ## Examples 中所使用的程式碼範例主題摘錄自`Custom Token`範例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的實作`SimpleWebToken`類別和`SimpleWebTokenHandler`類別，以及其他類別，可支援 SWT 權杖。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 如需此範例，並提供其他範例 WIF 以及有關下載這些檔案的位置資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼示範的覆寫屬性。The following code shows the override of the property. [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫 ，先判定指定的金鑰識別碼子句是否與這個執行個體相同。The method calls the to first determine whether the specified key identifier clause is the same as this instance. 預設實作會傳回第一個項目集合如果集合不是空的而且傳回`true`; 否則它會傳回`null`。The default implementation returns the first element of the collection if the collection is not empty and if returns `true`; otherwise, it returns `null`.

summary.span: 取得與安全性權杖相關聯的密碼編譯金鑰。

span.span: Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the security token.

value.span: 型別為 的 ，其中包含與安全性權杖相關聯之金鑰的集合。

span.span: A of type that contains the set of keys associated with the security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來設定保護權杖或 SOAP 訊息的這個安全性權杖的密碼編譯金鑰。Use the property to set the cryptographic keys for this security token to protect tokens or a SOAP message. 索引鍵可用，以及其他項目，來數位簽署或加密權杖或 SOAP 訊息。The keys can be used, among other things, to digitally sign or encrypt either tokens or SOAP messages. ## Examples 中所使用的程式碼範例主題摘錄自`Custom Token`範例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的實作`SimpleWebToken`類別和`SimpleWebTokenHandler`類別，以及其他類別，可支援 SWT 權杖。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 如需此範例，並提供其他範例 WIF 以及有關下載這些檔案的位置資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼示範的覆寫屬性。The following code shows the override of the property. [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 屬性，即可判定 權杖有效的期間。Use the and properties to determine the time period in which a token is valid. 和 屬性分別代表安全性權杖有效時的第一個和最後一個瞬間。The and properties represent the first and last instants in time in which the security token is valid, respectively. ## Examples 中所使用的程式碼範例主題摘錄自`Custom Token`範例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的實作`SimpleWebToken`類別和`SimpleWebTokenHandler`類別，以及其他類別，可支援 SWT 權杖。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 如需此範例，並提供其他範例 WIF 以及有關下載這些檔案的位置資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼示範的覆寫屬性。The following code shows the override of the property. [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#6)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#8)]

value.span: ，表示這個安全性權杖有效的最後一個瞬間。

span.span: A that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 屬性，即可判定 權杖有效的期間。Use the and properties to determine the time period in which a token is valid. 和 屬性分別代表安全性權杖有效時的第一個和最後一個瞬間。The and properties represent the first and last instants in time in which the security token is valid, respectively. ## Examples 中所使用的程式碼範例主題摘錄自`Custom Token`範例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的實作`SimpleWebToken`類別和`SimpleWebTokenHandler`類別，以及其他類別，可支援 SWT 權杖。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 如需此範例，並提供其他範例 WIF 以及有關下載這些檔案的位置資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼示範的覆寫屬性。The following code shows the override of the property. [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#7)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#8)]

span.span: You must override the property.
